showerReviews.reviewText: Not far from Nashville and you won't forget it with the airplanes flying over your site. The camp host's were super friendly. The campground is clean. Not a lot of spots for the dogs to potty. The bath houses were clean and I used the …

What a beautiful Campground. Only thing that could make it better is a playground. Bathrooms were clean (for a campground). Staff was friendly. Grills were operable, easy access to lake from campsite. Local police routinely drive through. Will definitely be back!

This campground is beautiful, quiet, clean! Is handicap accessible. The bathrooms are cleaned and stocked! The water sites are $100 more than the ones up the hill. It has rained but the old trees cover you in most places. I have a lot on my …

If you pay attention when booking you should have no problem finding a spot that fits your needs. Nicely wooded so you can barely see your neighbors, restrooms are clean, and there are some shower and laundry facilities.||We were in #77 and …

On June 6 2025 I was preparing to checkout at noon at campsite 5. I was working on a model car and had some tea on table. It was about 9 am so I went to change clothes. When I came back the cleaners literally had my stuff in their cart. …

Site 46, Have been to this site before, NEVER disappoints for sunsets! Has 20-30-50amp power, water, pick-nick table, grill and fire-ring. Kind of a pull off and  through! About 2/3 - 3/4 of sites are that way. Restrooms are far away from some sites, choose wisely grasshopper!!!

Site 28- wonderful view, large space between camp neighbors, lake front, lots of wildlife, quiet camp, friendly staff, clean, bathhouse 1 is up a hill, other bathhouse/showerhouse you can drive too. Great value compared to other camping/RV sites in the area. Book early for Lake front sites!
